entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:44 a.m. EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
